subject: Olympic Games
Track and Field
lead_paragraph: The former world-record holder Asafa Powell collected his second pre-Olympics victory in the 100 meters in three days, winning at the London Grand Prix in 9.94 seconds. The race had been promoted as a clash with Tyson Gay, the world champion. Gay pulled out because he has not yet recovered from a hamstring injury sustained last month at the United States Olympic Trials.
